attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petitions offer only a fig leaf of democracy - rather than encouraging debate they reduce political discussion to a two dimensional, yes/no, dichotomy in which whoever shouts loudest wins. All too often a significant minority are able to affect policy by being the most vocal and creating moral panics. As such we need "protection... against the tyranny of the prevailing opinion and feeling" (JS Mill).

We believe all political issues demand and deserve full intelligent consideration on an open platform combining views and opinions from the widest possible range of communities. This can not be achieved through petitions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
